title: Stapferhaus Lenzburg: Fake
description: For Stapferhaus in Lenzburg, we created several interactive installations that dare the visitor to think about fake items, news, and lies. One installation is a multiplayer based team game where two teams can playfully see who's better at fact-checking. Another one is an archive of lies where through scanning real packages, the visitor gets to vote how severe a lie is, which is all hooked up to a database to see which lies are the worst, and which that are necessary.

codeSnippets.title: Fake News Detection Mechanic
codeSnippets.description: This mechanic allows players to fact-check articles in real-time. It challenges users to identify fake news within a time limit.

codeSnippets.title: Voting System
codeSnippets.description: Players vote on the severity of lies found in scanned packages, and the results are stored in a database.
